name: Dark Roast
description: A rich and full-bodied roast with deep, bold flavors.

name: Medium Roast
description: Balanced flavor, aroma, and acidity. A favorite among many.

name: Light Roast
description: Mild in flavor, this roast is for those who prefer a smoother cup.

name: Espresso Roast
description: Perfect for espresso machines. Rich, caramel-like sweetness.

name: Organic Roast
description: 100% organic beans for a natural and clean taste.

name: Decaf Roast
description: All the flavor without the caffeine. Perfect for evening brews.
